1.title: Isaiah 43:19
1.subtitle: New Beginnings
1.description: God declares He is doing a new thing—making rivers in the desert—inviting us to step into fresh starts.

2.title: Lamentations 3:22-23
2.subtitle: Unfailing Mercy
2.description: God’s steadfast love never ceases; His mercies are new every morning, giving us hope each day.

3.title: James 1:5
3.subtitle: Ask for Wisdom
3.description: If anyone lacks wisdom, they can ask God, who gives generously to all without reproach.

4.title: Joshua 1:9
4.subtitle: Be Courageous
4.description: God commands us to be strong and courageous, reminding us He is with us wherever we go.

5.title: Romans 15:13
5.subtitle: Overflowing Hope
5.description: The God of hope fills you with all joy and peace as you trust in Him, so you overflow with hope.

6.title: 1 Peter 2:9
6.subtitle: Chosen People
6.description: You are a chosen race, royal priesthood, called out of darkness into God’s marvelous light.

7.title: Joel 2:25
7.subtitle: Years Restored
7.description: The Lord promises to restore the years the locusts have eaten, bringing back abundance and joy.

8.title: Matthew 11:28
8.subtitle: Rest for Souls
8.description: Jesus invites the weary to come to Him for rest, offering relief from burdens and peace for our hearts.

9.title: Psalm 23:1
9.subtitle: Divine Shepherd
9.description: The Lord is my shepherd; I lack nothing as He leads me beside still waters and restores my soul.

10.title: Jeremiah 29:11
10.subtitle: Hopeful Future
10.description: God declares His plans to prosper you and not to harm you, giving you a future filled with hope.

11.title: Philippians 4:13
11.subtitle: Strength in Christ
11.description: I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me, empowering me in every circumstance.

12.title: 2 Corinthians 12:9
12.subtitle: Sufficient Grace
12.description: My grace is sufficient for you, for My power is made perfect in weakness—Christ’s strength in you.

13.title: Psalm 27:1
13.subtitle: Divine Light
13.description: The Lord is my light and salvation; whom shall I fear? He is the stronghold of my life.

14.title: John 14:27
14.subtitle: Gift of Peace
14.description: Jesus gives His peace unlike the world’s—so our hearts need not be troubled or afraid.

15.title: Ephesians 3:20
15.subtitle: Beyond Immeasurable
15.description: God is able to do immeasurably more than we ask or imagine, according to His power at work in us.

16.title: Revelation 21:4
16.subtitle: Endless Comfort
16.description: He will wipe away every tear, abolish death, and bring eternal joy and healing to His people.

17.title: Psalm 91:4
17.subtitle: Under His Wings
17.description: He will cover you with His feathers, and under His wings you will find refuge and faithfulness.

18.title: 1 Peter 5:7
18.subtitle: Cast Your Cares
18.description: Cast all your anxiety on Him, because He cares deeply for you and provides perfect peace.

19.title: Hebrews 4:16
19.subtitle: Grace Abounds
19.description: Let us approach God’s throne of grace with confidence to receive mercy and find help in time of need.

20.title: Psalm 34:17
20.subtitle: Answered Prayers
20.description: When the righteous cry for help, the Lord hears and delivers them from all their troubles.

21.title: Psalm 30:5
21.subtitle: Joyful Morning
21.description: Weeping may last for the night, but joy comes in the morning—promising renewal after sorrow.

22.title: Isaiah 40:31
22.subtitle: Renewed Strength
22.description: Those who wait on the Lord will renew their strength, soaring on wings like eagles above trials.

23.title: Psalm 139:14
23.subtitle: Wonderfully Made
23.description: I praise You for I am fearfully and wonderfully made—celebrating the unique craftsmanship of my Creator.

24.title: Psalm 46:1
24.subtitle: Ever-Present Help
24.description: God is our refuge and strength, always ready to help in times of trouble and fear.

25.title: Deuteronomy 31:6
25.subtitle: Fearless Trust
25.description: Be strong and courageous, for the Lord goes before you and will never leave you or forsake you.

26.title: Psalm 37:4
26.subtitle: Delight in Him
26.description: Delight yourself in the Lord, and He will give you the desires of your heart in line with His will.

27.title: Isaiah 41:10
27.subtitle: Fear Not
27.description: Do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God who strengthens and helps you.

28.title: John 3:16
28.subtitle: Love Sacrificed
28.description: For God so loved the world that He gave His only Son, that whoever believes in Him shall not perish.

29.title: 1 John 4:18
29.subtitle: Perfect Love
29.description: There is no fear in love, for perfect love casts out fear and assures us of God’s unwavering affection.

30.title: Romans 8:28
30.subtitle: Purposeful Good
30.description: God works all things together for good for those who love Him, assuring a redemptive plan in every circumstance.

31.title: Philippians 4:6-7
31.subtitle: Peaceful Prayer
31.description: Do not be anxious about anything, but in every prayer present your requests and receive God’s peace that guards your heart.

32.title: 1 John 4:19
32.subtitle: First Loved
32.description: We love because he first loved us, grounding every act of love in divine origin.

33.title: Matthew 5:16
33.subtitle: Shine Your Light
33.description: Let your light shine before others, that they may see your good deeds and glorify your Father.

34.title: Proverbs 3:5-6
34.subtitle: Trusting Guidance
34.description: Trust in the Lord with all your heart, and he will direct your paths in every decision.

35.title: Psalm 27:14
35.subtitle: Hopeful Wait
35.description: Wait for the Lord; be strong, and let your heart take courage as you anticipate his deliverance.

36.title: Romans 12:12
36.subtitle: Joyful Endurance
36.description: Be joyful in hope, patient in affliction, faithful in prayer—four pillars of steadfast faith.

37.title: Psalm 56:3
37.subtitle: Fearless Trust
37.description: When I am afraid, I put my trust in you, anchoring my soul in your unshakeable faithfulness.

38.title: Ephesians 5:2
38.subtitle: Walk in Love
38.description: Walk in love, as Christ loved us and gave himself up as a fragrant offering to God.

39.title: Psalm 119:105
39.subtitle: Guiding Word
39.description: Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path, illuminating every step I take.

40.title: Colossians 3:14
40.subtitle: Perfect Bond
40.description: Above all, put on love, which binds everything together in perfect harmony.

41.title: John 13:34-35
41.subtitle: New Command
41.description: A new commandment: love one another as I have loved you—this is how the world will know you.

42.title: Psalm 100:5
42.subtitle: Steadfast Love
42.description: For the Lord is good; his steadfast love endures forever, and his faithfulness to all generations.

43.title: 1 Corinthians 16:14
43.subtitle: Do All in Love
43.description: Let all that you do be done in love, ensuring every action reflects the heart of Christ.

44.title: Psalm 36:7
44.subtitle: Sheltered in Love
44.description: How precious is your steadfast love, O God! Under the shadow of your wings we take refuge.

45.title: Galatians 5:22-23
45.subtitle: Fruit of Spirit
45.description: The fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, patience, kindness, goodness, faithfulness, gentleness, self-control.

46.title: Psalm 118:24
46.subtitle: Rejoice Today
46.description: This is the day that the Lord has made; let us rejoice and be glad in it, embracing each moment.

47.title: Philippians 2:3-4
47.subtitle: Others First
47.description: Do nothing from selfish ambition but in humility count others more significant than yourselves.

48.title: Hebrews 13:5
48.subtitle: Never Alone
48.description: I will never leave you nor forsake you—God’s promise that anchors us in every season.

49.title: Psalm 62:5
49.subtitle: Quiet Confidence
49.description: My soul waits quietly for God alone, my hope is from him—learning stillness in his presence.

50.title: Romans 8:38-39
50.subtitle: Unbreakable Love
50.description: Nothing can separate us from the love of God in Christ Jesus—not height, depth, nor any other created thing.

51.title: Psalm 37:5
51.subtitle: Commit and Trust
51.description: Commit your way to the Lord; trust in him, and he will act on your behalf with faithfulness.

52.title: 1 Thessalonians 5:16-18
52.subtitle: Pray Always
52.description: Rejoice always, pray without ceasing, give thanks in all circumstances—God’s rhythm for joyful living.

53.title: Psalm 86:15
53.subtitle: Slow to Anger
53.description: But you, O Lord, are a God merciful and gracious, slow to anger and abounding in steadfast love.

54.title: Matthew 6:33
54.subtitle: Seek First
54.description: Seek first the kingdom of God and his righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.

55.title: Psalm 121:5
55.subtitle: Ever Watching
55.description: The Lord is your keeper; the Lord is your shade on your right hand—constant divine protection.

56.title: John 15:12
56.subtitle: Love One Another
56.description: This is my commandment: that you love one another as I have loved you, modeling Christ’s sacrificial love.

57.title: Psalm 91:1
57.subtitle: Safe Refuge
57.description: He who dwells in the shelter of the Most High will abide in the shadow of the Almighty.

58.title: Philippians 1:6
58.subtitle: He Who Began
58.description: He who began a good work in you will bring it to completion at the day of Jesus Christ.

59.title: Hebrews 12:2
59.subtitle: Eyes on Jesus
59.description: Let us fix our eyes on Jesus, the pioneer and perfecter of faith, who endured the cross for our joy.

60.title: 2 Peter 3:9
60.subtitle: Patient Grace
60.description: The Lord is patient, not wanting any to perish but all to come to repentance—grace extended even in delay.

61.title: Ecclesiastes 3:1
61.subtitle: Time for Everything
61.description: There is a time for everything, and a season for every activity under the heavens—a reminder of divine timing.

62.title: Isaiah 55:10-11
62.subtitle: Word Will Flourish
62.description: Just as rain waters the earth, so shall God’s word accomplish all He purposes—it never returns void.

63.title: Hosea 6:3
63.subtitle: Spring Renewal
63.description: Let us press on to know the Lord; His coming is as sure as the dawn, refreshing as spring rains.

64.title: 2 Corinthians 5:17
64.subtitle: New Creation
64.description: If anyone is in Christ, they are a new creation; the old has gone, the new has come.

65.title: Psalm 40:1-2
65.subtitle: Lifted Up
65.description: I waited patiently for the Lord; He turned to me and lifted me from the pit and set my feet on solid ground.

66.title: John 15:5
66.subtitle: Fruitful Living
66.description: I am the vine; you are the branches. Abide in me and you will bear much fruit—apart from me, nothing.

67.title: Colossians 2:6-7
67.subtitle: Rooted in Christ
67.description: Continue to live in Christ, rooted and built up in Him, strengthened in the faith as you were taught.

68.title: James 3:17
68.subtitle: Wisdom from Above
68.description: Heavenly wisdom is pure, peace-loving, considerate, submissive, full of mercy and good fruit.

69.title: Psalm 92:12
69.subtitle: Flourishing Righteous
69.description: The righteous will flourish like a palm tree and grow like a cedar in Lebanon.

70.title: Isaiah 26:3
70.subtitle: Peaceful Mind
70.description: You keep in perfect peace those whose minds are steadfast, because they trust in You.

71.title: Romans 6:4
71.subtitle: Newness of Life
71.description: We were buried with Christ so that, just as He was raised, we too might walk in newness of life.

72.title: Psalm 119:18
72.subtitle: Opened Eyes
72.description: Open my eyes, that I may see wonderful things in your law—a prayer for spiritual clarity.

73.title: Matthew 7:7
73.subtitle: Ask and Receive
73.description: Ask and it will be given, seek and you will find, knock and the door will be opened to you.

74.title: Proverbs 4:23
74.subtitle: Guard Your Heart
74.description: Above all else, guard your heart, for everything you do flows from it.

75.title: Psalm 51:10
75.subtitle: Clean Heart
75.description: Create in me a clean heart, O God, and renew a right spirit within me.

76.title: Titus 3:5
76.subtitle: Washed by Grace
76.description: He saved us not because of righteous things we had done, but through the washing of rebirth and renewal.

77.title: Romans 10:17
77.subtitle: Hearing Faith
77.description: Faith comes by hearing, and hearing through the word of Christ.

78.title: Psalm 1:3
78.subtitle: Firmly Planted
78.description: They are like trees planted by streams of water, yielding fruit in season, never withering.

79.title: Luke 8:15
79.subtitle: Good Soil
79.description: Those with noble hearts hear the word, retain it, and by perseverance produce a good crop.

80.title: Psalm 25:10
80.subtitle: Loving Paths
80.description: All the ways of the Lord are loving and faithful toward those who keep His covenant.

81.title: Isaiah 32:18
81.subtitle: Peaceful Dwellings
81.description: My people will live in peaceful homes, secure dwellings, and undisturbed places of rest.

82.title: Mark 4:30-32
82.subtitle: Kingdom Growth
82.description: The kingdom of God is like a mustard seed—though small, it grows into a tree that shelters many.

83.title: Galatians 6:9
83.subtitle: Do Not Give Up
83.description: Let us not grow weary in doing good, for at the proper time we will reap a harvest if we do not give up.

84.title: Psalm 67:6-7
84.subtitle: Blessings Overflow
84.description: The earth yields its harvest; God blesses us so all ends of the earth will fear Him.

85.title: John 4:14
85.subtitle: Living Water
85.description: Whoever drinks the water I give will never thirst again—it will become a spring of eternal life.

86.title: Isaiah 58:11
86.subtitle: Guided Always
86.description: The Lord will guide you always; you’ll be like a well-watered garden, a spring whose waters never fail.

87.title: 2 Timothy 1:7
87.subtitle: Spirit of Power
87.description: God did not give us a spirit of fear, but of power, love, and self-control.

88.title: Psalm 126:5
88.subtitle: Sow in Tears
88.description: Those who sow in tears will reap with songs of joy—a promise of transformation through sorrow.

89.title: Isaiah 61:3
89.subtitle: Beauty for Ashes
89.description: God gives a crown of beauty for ashes, oil of joy for mourning, and a garment of praise for despair.

90.title: John 6:35
90.subtitle: Bread of Life
90.description: Jesus said, I am the bread of life. Whoever comes to me shall not hunger and will never thirst.

91.title: Matthew 28:6
91.subtitle: He Is Risen
91.description: He is not here; he has risen, just as he said. Come, see the place where he lay.

92.title: Romans 8:11
92.subtitle: Resurrection Power
92.description: The Spirit who raised Jesus from the dead dwells in you and will also give life to your mortal bodies.

93.title: 1 Peter 1:3
93.subtitle: Living Hope
93.description: God has given us new birth into a living hope through the resurrection of Jesus Christ from the dead.

94.title: John 11:25
94.subtitle: The Resurrection
94.description: Jesus said, 'I am the resurrection and the life. Whoever believes in me shall live, even though they die.'

95.title: Colossians 3:1
95.subtitle: Raised with Christ
95.description: Set your hearts on things above, where Christ is seated, for you have been raised with Him.

96.title: 2 Corinthians 4:16
96.subtitle: Inner Renewal
96.description: Though outwardly we are wasting away, inwardly we are being renewed day by day.

97.title: John 12:24
97.subtitle: Fruitful Death
97.description: Unless a seed dies, it remains alone. But if it dies, it bears much fruit—symbolizing spiritual rebirth.

98.title: Ezekiel 36:26
98.subtitle: New Heart
98.description: I will give you a new heart and a new spirit, removing your heart of stone and giving you a heart of flesh.

99.title: Galatians 2:20
99.subtitle: Christ Lives in Me
99.description: I have been crucified with Christ. It is no longer I who live, but Christ who lives in me.

100.title: Romans 12:2
100.subtitle: Transformed Mind
100.description: Do not conform to the patterns of this world, but be transformed by the renewing of your mind.

101.title: Psalm 103:5
101.subtitle: Renewed Youth
101.description: He satisfies your desires with good things so that your youth is renewed like the eagle’s.

102.title: 2 Corinthians 5:21
102.subtitle: Perfect Exchange
102.description: God made Him who knew no sin to be sin for us, so that in Him we might become the righteousness of God.

103.title: Isaiah 53:5
103.subtitle: Healed by Stripes
103.description: He was pierced for our transgressions… by His wounds we are healed—Christ’s sacrificial love for us.

104.title: Romans 5:8
104.subtitle: Love Proven
104.description: God demonstrates His love for us in this: while we were still sinners, Christ died for us.

105.title: Hebrews 9:14
105.subtitle: Purified Conscience
105.description: The blood of Christ purifies our conscience from dead works to serve the living God.

106.title: Psalm 51:12
106.subtitle: Restored Joy
106.description: Restore to me the joy of your salvation and uphold me with a willing spirit.

107.title: Isaiah 61:1
107.subtitle: Good News Sent
107.description: The Lord has anointed me to proclaim good news to the poor, bind the brokenhearted, and release captives.

108.title: Luke 24:45
108.subtitle: Opened Minds
108.description: Then he opened their minds so they could understand the Scriptures—a work of divine revelation.

109.title: Philippians 3:10
109.subtitle: Know Christ
109.description: I want to know Christ and the power of His resurrection and share in His sufferings.

110.title: Romans 8:1
110.subtitle: No Condemnation
110.description: There is now no condemnation for those who are in Christ Jesus—freedom secured through faith.

111.title: Micah 7:8
111.subtitle: Rise Again
111.description: Though I fall, I shall rise; though I sit in darkness, the Lord will be my light.

112.title: Acts 3:19
112.subtitle: Times of Refreshing
112.description: Repent and turn to God, that your sins may be wiped out and times of refreshing may come.

113.title: John 20:29
113.subtitle: Blessed Belief
113.description: Blessed are those who have not seen and yet have believed—faith beyond sight is honored.

114.title: Hebrews 10:23
114.subtitle: Hold Fast
114.description: Let us hold fast the confession of our hope without wavering, for He who promised is faithful.

115.title: Isaiah 41:13
115.subtitle: Held by God
115.description: I am the Lord your God, who takes hold of your right hand and says, 'Do not fear; I will help you.'

116.title: 1 John 1:9
116.subtitle: Faithful to Forgive
116.description: If we confess our sins, He is faithful and just to forgive us and cleanse us from all unrighteousness.

117.title: John 14:6
117.subtitle: The Way
117.description: Jesus said, 'I am the way, the truth, and the life. No one comes to the Father except through Me.'

118.title: Romans 1:16
118.subtitle: Not Ashamed
118.description: I am not ashamed of the gospel, for it is the power of God for salvation to everyone who believes.

119.title: John 10:11
119.subtitle: Good Shepherd
119.description: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down His life for the sheep.

120.title: Mark 16:15
120.subtitle: Go and Proclaim
120.description: Go into all the world and proclaim the gospel to all creation—a global calling to share good news.

121.title: Psalm 19:1
121.subtitle: Glory Revealed
121.description: The heavens declare the glory of God, and the skies proclaim the work of His hands.

122.title: Romans 1:20
122.subtitle: Invisible Seen
122.description: God’s invisible qualities—eternal power and divine nature—are clearly seen through creation.

123.title: Genesis 8:22
123.subtitle: Season’s Promise
123.description: As long as the earth endures, seedtime and harvest, cold and heat, summer and winter shall never cease.

124.title: 1 Chronicles 16:11
124.subtitle: Seek Continually
124.description: Seek the Lord and His strength; seek His presence continually with a devoted heart.

125.title: Psalm 121:8
125.subtitle: Going Out, Coming In
125.description: The Lord will watch over your coming and going, both now and forevermore.

126.title: Proverbs 16:3
126.subtitle: Commit Plans
126.description: Commit your work to the Lord, and your plans will be established.

127.title: Psalm 84:11
127.subtitle: No Good Withheld
127.description: The Lord is a sun and shield; He gives grace and glory—no good thing does He withhold.

128.title: Isaiah 40:8
128.subtitle: Word Stands Forever
128.description: The grass withers and the flowers fade, but the word of our God stands forever.

129.title: Luke 12:27
129.subtitle: Clothed in Beauty
129.description: Consider the lilies, how they grow. Even Solomon wasn’t dressed like one of these.

130.title: Matthew 6:26
130.subtitle: Valued More
130.description: Look at the birds—they don’t sow or reap, yet God feeds them. Are you not of more value?

131.title: Psalm 100:2
131.subtitle: Joyful Worship
131.description: Serve the Lord with gladness; come before Him with joyful singing.

132.title: Hebrews 13:15
132.subtitle: Continual Praise
132.description: Let us continually offer a sacrifice of praise—the fruit of lips that confess His name.

133.title: Zephaniah 3:17
133.subtitle: God Sings Over You
133.description: The Lord will rejoice over you with gladness; He will quiet you with His love and exult with singing.

134.title: Psalm 30:11
134.subtitle: Joy Replaces Mourning
134.description: You turned my mourning into dancing; you clothed me with joy instead of sackcloth.

135.title: Ecclesiastes 3:11
135.subtitle: Beautiful in Time
135.description: God has made everything beautiful in its time and placed eternity in the human heart.

136.title: Isaiah 61:11
136.subtitle: Sprouting Righteousness
136.description: As a garden causes what is sown to grow, so the Lord causes righteousness to spring up before all.

137.title: James 1:17
137.subtitle: Good Gifts
137.description: Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of heavenly lights.

138.title: Psalm 65:9-10
138.subtitle: Watering the Earth
138.description: You visit the earth and water it; you enrich it abundantly, softening it with showers and blessing growth.

139.title: Proverbs 11:25
139.subtitle: Refreshed When Generous
139.description: Whoever refreshes others will be refreshed—generosity returns blessing to the giver.

140.title: Galatians 5:13
140.subtitle: Serve Through Love
140.description: Do not use your freedom to indulge the flesh, but serve one another humbly in love.

141.title: Acts 20:35
141.subtitle: Blessing in Giving
141.description: It is more blessed to give than to receive—a joy modeled by Jesus Himself.

142.title: Luke 6:38
142.subtitle: Overflowing Measure
142.description: Give, and it will be given to you—a good measure, pressed down, shaken together, running over.

143.title: Colossians 3:17
143.subtitle: All in Jesus’ Name
143.description: Whatever you do—in word or deed—do it all in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to the Father.

144.title: 1 John 3:18
144.subtitle: Love with Action
144.description: Let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

145.title: Romans 13:10
145.subtitle: Fulfilled by Love
145.description: Love does no harm to a neighbor; therefore love is the fulfillment of the law.

146.title: Titus 2:14
146.subtitle: Zealous for Good
146.description: Christ redeemed us to purify for Himself a people eager to do what is good.

147.title: Proverbs 3:27
147.subtitle: Do Not Delay Good
147.description: Do not withhold good from those to whom it is due, when it is in your power to act.

148.title: Matthew 5:9
148.subtitle: Peacemakers Blessed
148.description: Blessed are the peacemakers, for they will be called children of God.

149.title: Romans 14:19
149.subtitle: Build Peace
149.description: Let us pursue what makes for peace and mutual upbuilding—a call to unity.

150.title: Isaiah 32:17
150.subtitle: Fruit of Righteousness
150.description: The fruit of righteousness will be peace; its effect will be quietness and confidence forever.

151.title: James 3:18
151.subtitle: Sow Peace
151.description: Peacemakers who sow in peace reap a harvest of righteousness.

152.title: Psalm 27:8
152.subtitle: Seek His Face
152.description: You have said, 'Seek my face.' My heart says, 'Your face, Lord, do I seek.'

153.title: Isaiah 60:1
153.subtitle: Rise and Shine
153.description: Arise, shine, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord rises upon you.

154.title: Matthew 5:14
154.subtitle: City on a Hill
154.description: You are the light of the world. A city set on a hill cannot be hidden.

155.title: John 8:12
155.subtitle: Light of Life
155.description: Jesus said, 'I am the light of the world. Whoever follows me will never walk in darkness.'

156.title: 1 Thessalonians 5:5
156.subtitle: Children of Light
156.description: You are all children of the light and children of the day. We do not belong to the night.

157.title: Ephesians 5:8
157.subtitle: Live as Light
157.description: You were once darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Live as children of light.

158.title: Psalm 119:130
158.subtitle: Understanding Shines
158.description: The unfolding of your words gives light; it imparts understanding to the simple.

159.title: 2 Samuel 22:29
159.subtitle: Lamp Lit
159.description: You are my lamp, O Lord; the Lord turns my darkness into light.

160.title: Micah 7:7
160.subtitle: Watch Expectantly
160.description: I watch in hope for the Lord; I wait for God my Savior. My God will hear me.

161.title: Psalm 37:23-24
161.subtitle: Firm Steps
161.description: The steps of a man are established by the Lord. Though he fall, he will not be cast down.

162.title: Psalm 18:2
162.subtitle: My Fortress
162.description: The Lord is my rock, my fortress, and my deliverer—my God, my strength in whom I trust.

163.title: Isaiah 33:6
163.subtitle: Stability and Strength
163.description: He will be the sure foundation for your times, a rich store of salvation, wisdom, and knowledge.

164.title: Nehemiah 8:10
164.subtitle: Strength in Joy
164.description: Do not grieve, for the joy of the Lord is your strength.

165.title: Psalm 28:7
165.subtitle: Help and Song
165.description: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusts in Him, and I am helped.

166.title: Isaiah 40:29
166.subtitle: Power for Weak
166.description: He gives power to the faint, and to him who has no might He increases strength.

167.title: Habakkuk 3:19
167.subtitle: Feet Like Deer
167.description: The Sovereign Lord is my strength; He makes my feet like the deer’s and enables me to tread on heights.

168.title: Exodus 15:2
168.subtitle: My Song
168.description: The Lord is my strength and my defense; He has become my salvation.

169.title: 2 Corinthians 3:17
169.subtitle: Freedom in Spirit
169.description: Where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

170.title: John 8:36
170.subtitle: Truly Free
170.description: If the Son sets you free, you will be free indeed.

171.title: Galatians 5:1
171.subtitle: Stand Free
171.description: It is for freedom that Christ has set us free. Stand firm, and do not be burdened again.

172.title: Romans 6:18
172.subtitle: Free to Serve
172.description: You have been set free from sin and have become slaves to righteousness.

173.title: Psalm 146:7
173.subtitle: Prisoners Freed
173.description: The Lord sets prisoners free, giving justice to the oppressed and food to the hungry.

174.title: James 1:25
174.subtitle: Law of Liberty
174.description: Whoever looks intently into the perfect law that gives freedom and does it will be blessed.

175.title: Isaiah 61:1
175.subtitle: Set Free
175.description: He has sent me to bind the brokenhearted, proclaim liberty to captives, and release from darkness.

176.title: Romans 8:2
176.subtitle: Free from Sin
176.description: Through Christ Jesus, the law of the Spirit who gives life has set you free from sin and death.

177.title: Psalm 119:45
177.subtitle: Walk in Freedom
177.description: I will walk about in freedom, for I have sought out your precepts.

178.title: Galatians 5:13
178.subtitle: Free to Serve
178.description: Do not use your freedom to indulge the flesh—rather, serve one another humbly in love.

179.title: 1 Peter 2:16
179.subtitle: Free Yet Responsible
179.description: Live as people who are free, not using liberty as cover-up, but living as servants of God.

180.title: Colossians 1:13
180.subtitle: Rescued and Free
180.description: He has rescued us from the domain of darkness and transferred us into the kingdom of His Son.

181.title: 2 Samuel 22:20
181.subtitle: Delighted Deliverance
181.description: He brought me out into a spacious place; He rescued me because He delighted in me.

182.title: 1 Samuel 8:7
182.subtitle: Rejected God
182.description: They have not rejected you, but they have rejected me as their king—choosing human rule over divine leadership.

183.title: 1 Samuel 8:11
183.subtitle: Tyranny Foretold
183.description: This is what the king will do: take sons for war, reap fields, and enslave the people—warning against earthly rulers.

184.title: Psalm 118:8-9
184.subtitle: Trust God Over Men
184.description: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in man or princes—divine protection is superior.

185.title: Jeremiah 17:5
185.subtitle: Cursed Trust
185.description: Cursed is the one who trusts in man, who draws strength from flesh and turns away from the Lord.

186.title: Isaiah 2:22
186.subtitle: Frail Breath
186.description: Stop regarding man, whose breath is in his nostrils—for of what account is he?

187.title: Psalm 33:16-17
187.subtitle: No Saving Kings
187.description: No king is saved by his great army; a horse is a vain hope for deliverance—the Lord alone saves.

188.title: Psalm 20:7
188.subtitle: God Over Chariots
188.description: Some trust in chariots and horses, but we trust in the name of the Lord our God.

189.title: Romans 13:1
189.subtitle: Divine Authority
189.description: There is no authority except from God, and those that exist have been instituted by Him.

190.title: Daniel 2:21
190.subtitle: Sets Up Kings
190.description: God changes times and seasons; He removes kings and sets them up—sovereign over all leadership.

191.title: Proverbs 21:1
191.subtitle: Hearts in Hand
191.description: The king’s heart is a stream of water in the hand of the Lord; He turns it wherever He will.

192.title: Deuteronomy 17:14-20
192.subtitle: Limits on Kings
192.description: God permitted kings but warned they must not rely on riches or pride, and must revere the law.

193.title: Matthew 23:11
193.subtitle: The Servant Leader
193.description: The greatest among you shall be your servant—true leadership mirrors Christ’s humility.

194.title: Mark 10:45
194.subtitle: Serve Like Christ
194.description: The Son of Man came not to be served but to serve and give His life as a ransom for many.

195.title: Isaiah 9:6
195.subtitle: Prince of Peace
195.description: The government shall be on His shoulders—Wonderful Counselor, Mighty God, Everlasting Father, Prince of Peace.

196.title: Revelation 19:16
196.subtitle: King of Kings
196.description: On His robe and thigh He has this name written: King of kings and Lord of lords—Christ alone reigns.

197.title: Psalm 145:13
197.subtitle: Eternal Kingdom
197.description: Your kingdom is an everlasting kingdom, and your dominion endures through all generations.

198.title: Philippians 2:10-11
198.subtitle: Every Knee Bow
198.description: At the name of Jesus every knee shall bow and every tongue confess that He is Lord.

199.title: Revelation 11:15
199.subtitle: He Shall Reign
199.description: The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and of His Christ, and He shall reign forever.

200.title: Hebrews 1:8
200.subtitle: Righteous Throne
200.description: Your throne, O God, is forever and ever; a scepter of righteousness is the scepter of your kingdom.

201.title: Zechariah 14:9
201.subtitle: One King
201.description: The Lord will be king over the whole earth; on that day there will be one Lord, and His name the only name.

202.title: Colossians 1:18
202.subtitle: Head of Church
202.description: Christ is the head of the body, the church—He is the beginning and firstborn from the dead.

203.title: 1 Timothy 6:15
203.subtitle: Blazing Glory
203.description: God will bring it about in His time—He who is the blessed and only Sovereign, King of kings and Lord of lords.

204.title: Isaiah 33:22
204.subtitle: The True Judge
204.description: For the Lord is our judge, lawgiver, and king; it is He who will save us.

205.title: John 18:36
205.subtitle: Not of This World
205.description: Jesus answered, 'My kingdom is not of this world.' Earthly power is no match for eternal rule.

206.title: Luke 22:26
206.subtitle: Flip the Hierarchy
206.description: Let the greatest among you become as the youngest, and the leader as one who serves.

207.title: Psalm 2:1-2
207.subtitle: Kings Plot in Vain
207.description: Why do the nations rage and the kings plot? The Lord laughs, for their power is fleeting.

208.title: Daniel 4:35
208.subtitle: No One Resists
208.description: He does as He pleases with the powers of heaven and earth—no one can hold back His hand.

209.title: Revelation 3:21
209.subtitle: Co-Reigning Promise
209.description: To the one who overcomes, I will grant to sit with me on my throne—Christ shares His victory.

210.title: Luke 1:33
210.subtitle: Endless Kingdom
210.description: He will reign over Jacob’s descendants forever; His kingdom will never end.

211.title: Psalm 144:3-4
211.subtitle: Fragile Kings
211.description: What is man that you regard him? He is like a breath; his days pass like a fleeting shadow.

212.title: Revelation 1:5
212.subtitle: Faithful Witness
212.description: Jesus Christ, the faithful witness, the firstborn of the dead, and ruler of the kings of the earth.

182.title: 1 Samuel 8:7
182.subtitle: God Our King
182.description: The people rejected Samuel—but God reminds us that true kingship belongs to Him, who rules with love and wisdom.

183.title: Isaiah 33:22
183.subtitle: Ruler and Savior
183.description: The Lord is our judge, lawgiver, and king—He Himself saves us, guiding with justice and mercy.

184.title: Psalm 47:7
184.subtitle: King of All
184.description: For God is the King of all the earth; sing praises with a psalm of understanding and celebration.

185.title: Psalm 95:3
185.subtitle: Great Above All
185.description: The Lord is a great God, the great King above all gods—worthy of joy and reverence.

186.title: Psalm 145:1
186.subtitle: Exalted King
186.description: I will extol you, my God and King; I will bless your name forever and ever with gladness.

187.title: Zechariah 9:9
187.subtitle: Gentle King
187.description: See, your king comes to you righteous and having salvation, gentle and riding on a donkey—our humble Redeemer.

188.title: Matthew 21:5
188.subtitle: Peaceful Reign
188.description: Jesus enters Jerusalem as foretold—a king coming in humility to bring peace to the nations.

189.title: John 10:11
189.subtitle: Good Shepherd
189.description: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down His life for the sheep out of love.

190.title: Psalm 23:4
190.subtitle: Comforted by Staff
190.description: Even when I walk through darkness, I will fear no evil—for Your rod and staff comfort me.

191.title: Isaiah 40:11
191.subtitle: Tender Care
191.description: He tends His flock like a shepherd, gathering lambs and gently carrying them close to His heart.

192.title: Micah 5:4
192.subtitle: Strength and Peace
192.description: He will shepherd His people in the strength of the Lord, and they will live securely with peace.

193.title: Psalm 100:3
193.subtitle: We Are His
193.description: Know that the Lord is God. It is He who made us, and we are His—His people, the sheep of His pasture.

194.title: Ezekiel 34:15
194.subtitle: Shepherd’s Rest
194.description: I Myself will tend My sheep and give them rest—declares the Sovereign Lord.

195.title: Revelation 7:17
195.subtitle: Living Waters
195.description: The Lamb at the center of the throne will shepherd them and lead them to springs of living water.

196.title: 1 Peter 2:25
196.subtitle: Returned to Shepherd
196.description: You were like sheep going astray, but now you have returned to the Shepherd and Overseer of your souls.

197.title: Psalm 28:9
197.subtitle: Bless Your Heritage
197.description: Save Your people and bless Your heritage; be their shepherd and carry them forever.

198.title: Psalm 48:14
198.subtitle: Guide Always
198.description: For this God is our God forever and ever; He will guide us even to the end.

199.title: Matthew 6:33
199.subtitle: First His Kingdom
199.description: Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness, and all these things will be added to you.

200.title: Philippians 3:20
200.subtitle: Citizens of Heaven
200.description: Our citizenship is in heaven, and we eagerly await a Savior from there—the Lord Jesus Christ.

201.title: Hebrews 12:28
201.subtitle: Unshakable Kingdom
201.description: Let us be thankful and worship God acceptably, for we are receiving a kingdom that cannot be shaken.

202.title: Daniel 7:14
202.subtitle: Eternal Dominion
202.description: His dominion is everlasting and will not pass away; His kingdom will never be destroyed.

203.title: Revelation 5:13
203.subtitle: All Creation Sings
203.description: Every creature in heaven and on earth gives blessing and honor to Him who sits on the throne.

204.title: Psalm 93:1
204.subtitle: Majestic Reign
204.description: The Lord reigns, robed in majesty; the world is firmly established and cannot be moved.

205.title: Psalm 103:19
205.subtitle: Rules Over All
205.description: The Lord has established His throne in heaven, and His kingdom rules over all.

206.title: Isaiah 6:1
206.subtitle: Throned in Glory
206.description: I saw the Lord seated on a throne, high and exalted, and the train of His robe filled the temple.

207.title: John 18:36
207.subtitle: Kingdom Eternal
207.description: Jesus said, 'My kingdom is not of this world'—His reign transcends earthly systems.

208.title: Luke 1:33
208.subtitle: Forever Reign
208.description: He will reign over Jacob’s descendants forever; His kingdom will never end.

209.title: Psalm 145:13
209.subtitle: Faithful Rule
209.description: Your kingdom is everlasting, and your dominion endures through all generations.

210.title: Revelation 11:15
210.subtitle: He Shall Reign
210.description: The kingdom of the world has become the kingdom of our Lord and His Messiah, and He shall reign forever.

211.title: 1 Timothy 1:17
211.subtitle: Eternal King
211.description: To the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only God—be honor and glory forever and ever.

212.title: Psalm 145:10-11
212.subtitle: Tell of Your Kingdom
212.description: All Your works shall give thanks, and Your faithful people speak of the glory of Your kingdom.

213.title: Isaiah 58:10
213.subtitle: Light Rises
213.description: When you satisfy the needs of the oppressed, your light will rise in the darkness—compassion ignites joy.

214.title: Proverbs 11:30
214.subtitle: Fruit of Life
214.description: The fruit of the righteous is a tree of life, and the one who wins souls is wise.

215.title: Psalm 34:8
215.subtitle: Taste and See
215.description: Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in Him.

216.title: Ephesians 2:10
216.subtitle: Created for Good
216.description: We are God's workmanship, created in Christ Jesus to do good works prepared in advance for us.

217.title: Romans 12:4-5
217.subtitle: Many Members
217.description: As in one body we have many parts, each belongs to all the others—unity in diversity through Christ.

218.title: Psalm 133:1
218.subtitle: Beautiful Unity
218.description: How good and pleasant it is when God’s people live together in unity—like oil poured in blessing.

219.title: Isaiah 61:10
219.subtitle: Garments of Joy
219.description: I delight greatly in the Lord; He clothed me with garments of salvation and wrapped me in righteousness.

220.title: Matthew 13:43
220.subtitle: Shine Like the Sun
220.description: Then the righteous will shine like the sun in the kingdom of their Father.

221.title: Psalm 90:14
221.subtitle: Satisfy Early
221.description: Satisfy us in the morning with Your unfailing love, that we may sing for joy all our days.

222.title: Philippians 2:15
222.subtitle: Stars in the Sky
222.description: Shine among them like stars in the sky as you hold firmly to the word of life.

223.title: Romans 8:14
223.subtitle: Led by Spirit
223.description: All who are led by the Spirit of God are children of God—walking in divine adoption.

224.title: Isaiah 61:3
224.subtitle: Beauty from Ashes
224.description: He gives a crown of beauty instead of ashes, oil of joy instead of mourning—a garment of praise instead of despair.

225.title: Psalm 139:16
225.subtitle: Written Days
225.description: All the days ordained for me were written in Your book before one of them came to be.

226.title: Ecclesiastes 11:6
226.subtitle: Sow Morning and Evening
226.description: Sow your seed in the morning and do not be idle in the evening—you do not know what will succeed.

227.title: Psalm 147:3
227.subtitle: Heals the Brokenhearted
227.description: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds—gentle restoration from the Creator.

228.title: 1 John 4:16
228.subtitle: God Is Love
228.description: God is love. Whoever lives in love lives in God, and God in them.

229.title: Proverbs 4:18
229.subtitle: Dawning Path
229.description: The path of the righteous is like the morning sun, shining ever brighter till full day.

230.title: Psalm 19:14
230.subtitle: Pleasing Words
230.description: May the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be pleasing in Your sight, O Lord.

231.title: John 1:5
231.subtitle: Light Over Darkness
231.description: The light shines in the darkness, and the darkness has not overcome it.

232.title: Romans 14:17
232.subtitle: Kingdom Living
232.description: The kingdom of God is not eating and drinking but righteousness, peace, and joy in the Holy Spirit.

233.title: Psalm 84:10
233.subtitle: Better in Your House
233.description: Better is one day in Your courts than a thousand elsewhere.

234.title: Matthew 5:6
234.subtitle: Hunger for Righteousness
234.description: Blessed are those who hunger and thirst for righteousness, for they shall be filled.

235.title: Psalm 73:26
235.subtitle: God Is My Strength
235.description: My flesh and heart may fail, but God is the strength of my heart and my portion forever.

236.title: Isaiah 55:12
236.subtitle: Go Out in Joy
236.description: You will go out in joy and be led forth in peace; the mountains and hills will burst into song before you.

237.title: Romans 15:5
237.subtitle: Spirit of Unity
237.description: May the God who gives endurance and encouragement grant you unity of mind in Christ Jesus.

238.title: Psalm 115:1
238.subtitle: Glory to Your Name
238.description: Not to us, O Lord, not to us but to Your name be the glory, because of Your love and faithfulness.

239.title: Isaiah 12:2
239.subtitle: Sure Salvation
239.description: Behold, God is my salvation; I will trust and not be afraid. The Lord Himself is my strength and defense.

240.title: Philippians 4:4
240.subtitle: Rejoice Always
240.description: Rejoice in the Lord always. I will say it again: Rejoice!

241.title: Jeremiah 17:7
241.subtitle: Blessed Trust
241.description: Blessed is the one who trusts in the Lord, whose confidence is in Him.

242.title: Psalm 111:10
242.subtitle: Wisdom Begins
242.description: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom; all who follow His precepts have good understanding.

243.title: Romans 10:15
243.subtitle: Beautiful Feet
243.description: How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!

244.title: Galatians 6:7
244.subtitle: What You Sow
244.description: Do not be deceived: God cannot be mocked. A man reaps what he sows—choose wisely, sow generously.

245.title: Proverbs 10:28
245.subtitle: Joyful Hope
245.description: The hope of the righteous brings joy, but the expectation of the wicked will perish.

246.title: Ecclesiastes 3:2
246.subtitle: Time to Plant
246.description: There is a time to plant and a time to uproot—seasons change, but God’s wisdom stays firm.

247.title: Isaiah 28:29
247.subtitle: Wonderful Counsel
247.description: All this comes from the Lord Almighty, whose plan is wonderful, whose wisdom is magnificent.

248.title: Psalm 126:6
248.subtitle: Reap with Joy
248.description: Those who go out weeping, bearing seed for sowing, shall return with songs of joy carrying sheaves.

249.title: James 5:7
249.subtitle: Patient Harvest
249.description: Be patient, like a farmer waiting for the land to yield its crop—stand firm until the Lord’s coming.

250.title: Proverbs 24:16
250.subtitle: Rise Again
250.description: Though the righteous fall seven times, they rise again—steadfastness marks the faithful.

251.title: Philippians 1:9-10
251.subtitle: Abounding Love
251.description: May your love abound more and more in knowledge and depth of insight, discerning what is best.

252.title: Psalm 19:7
252.subtitle: Perfect Law
252.description: The law of the Lord is perfect, reviving the soul; the statutes of the Lord are trustworthy and wise.

253.title: Isaiah 30:21
253.subtitle: Whispered Guidance
253.description: Your ears will hear a voice behind you, saying, 'This is the way; walk in it.'

254.title: Romans 11:33
254.subtitle: Depth of Wisdom
254.description: Oh, the depth of the riches of the wisdom and knowledge of God! His judgments are unsearchable.

255.title: Psalm 25:9
255.subtitle: Guides the Humble
255.description: He guides the humble in what is right and teaches them His way.

256.title: Hebrews 6:10
256.subtitle: Not Forgotten
256.description: God is not unjust; He will not forget your work and the love you’ve shown Him by serving His people.

257.title: Matthew 9:37-38
257.subtitle: Laborers Needed
257.description: The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few—ask the Lord to send laborers into His harvest.

258.title: Colossians 3:23-24
258.subtitle: Work for the Lord
258.description: Whatever you do, work at it with all your heart, as working for the Lord, not for human masters.

259.title: 2 Thessalonians 3:13
259.subtitle: Do Not Grow Tired
259.description: As for you, never tire of doing what is good—endurance keeps faith alive.

260.title: Isaiah 50:4
260.subtitle: Word for the Weary
260.description: The Sovereign Lord gives me a well-instructed tongue, to know the word that sustains the weary.

261.title: Psalm 37:7
261.subtitle: Rest and Wait
261.description: Be still before the Lord and wait patiently for Him; do not fret when others seem to succeed.

262.title: Romans 15:4
262.subtitle: Scripture Gives Hope
262.description: Everything written in the past was to teach us, so that through endurance and the Scriptures we have hope.

263.title: Isaiah 26:9
263.subtitle: Soul Longs for You
263.description: My soul yearns for You in the night; my spirit within me diligently seeks You.

264.title: Matthew 11:29
264.subtitle: Gentle Teacher
264.description: Take my yoke upon you and learn from Me, for I am gentle and humble in heart.

265.title: Psalm 119:50
265.subtitle: Comfort in Promise
265.description: My comfort in suffering is this: Your promise preserves my life.

266.title: 2 Corinthians 1:3-4
266.subtitle: Comfort Shared
266.description: God comforts us in all our troubles, so we can comfort others with the same comfort we receive.

267.title: John 15:7
267.subtitle: Abide and Ask
267.description: If you abide in Me and My words in you, ask whatever you wish, and it will be done.

268.title: Psalm 63:1
268.subtitle: Early Will I Seek
268.description: O God, You are my God; earnestly I seek You—my soul thirsts and my body longs for You.

269.title: Hebrews 12:1
269.subtitle: Run Your Race
269.description: Let us run with endurance the race marked out for us, laying aside every weight.

270.title: Jeremiah 17:10
270.subtitle: Searches the Heart
270.description: I, the Lord, search the heart and examine the mind to reward each according to their deeds.

271.title: Psalm 139:23-24
271.subtitle: Search Me God
271.description: Search me, O God, and know my heart; test me and lead me in the way everlasting.

272.title: James 4:8
272.subtitle: Draw Near
272.description: Draw near to God, and He will draw near to you. Cleanse your hands and purify your heart.

273.title: Psalm 51:17
273.subtitle: Broken and Contrite
273.description: The sacrifices of God are a broken spirit; a contrite heart He will not despise.

274.title: Isaiah 25:4
274.subtitle: Shelter from Storm
274.description: You have been a refuge for the poor and needy—a shelter from the storm and shade from the heat.

275.title: Psalm 91:2
275.subtitle: My Refuge
275.description: I will say of the Lord, 'He is my refuge and fortress, my God, in whom I trust.'

276.title: Nahum 1:7
276.subtitle: Stronghold in Trouble
276.description: The Lord is good, a stronghold in the day of trouble; He knows those who take refuge in Him.

277.title: Proverbs 18:10
277.subtitle: Safe Tower
277.description: The name of the Lord is a strong tower; the righteous run to it and are safe.

278.title: Psalm 34:8
278.subtitle: Taste and Trust
278.description: Taste and see that the Lord is good; blessed is the one who takes refuge in Him.

279.title: Isaiah 26:4
279.subtitle: Everlasting Rock
279.description: Trust in the Lord forever, for the Lord, the Lord himself, is the Rock eternal.

280.title: Psalm 27:5
280.subtitle: Hidden in Shelter
280.description: In the day of trouble He will keep me safe in His dwelling and set me high on a rock.

281.title: 2 Thessalonians 3:3
281.subtitle: Faithful Protector
281.description: The Lord is faithful, and He will strengthen and protect you from the evil one.

282.title: Psalm 121:7-8
282.subtitle: Keeps You Always
282.description: The Lord will keep you from all harm—He will watch over your life, your coming and going forever.

283.title: Isaiah 43:2
283.subtitle: With You in Fire
283.description: When you pass through waters and fire, they will not overwhelm you—for I am with you.

284.title: Psalm 46:10
284.subtitle: Be Still
284.description: Be still, and know that I am God—I will be exalted among the nations, in all the earth.

285.title: Hebrews 13:6
285.subtitle: No Fear
285.description: So we say with confidence: 'The Lord is my helper; I will not be afraid.'

286.title: 1 John 5:4
286.subtitle: Faith Overcomes
286.description: Everyone born of God overcomes the world—this is the victory that has overcome: our faith.

287.title: Romans 16:20
287.subtitle: Crushed Evil
287.description: The God of peace will soon crush Satan under your feet—strength flows from divine justice.

288.title: Psalm 56:4
288.subtitle: Trust Drives Out Fear
288.description: In God, whose word I praise, I trust and am not afraid—what can man do to me?

289.title: 2 Corinthians 4:8-9
289.subtitle: Not Destroyed
289.description: We are hard pressed but not crushed; perplexed but not in despair—carrying resilience through trials.

290.title: Ephesians 6:11
290.subtitle: Armor of God
290.description: Put on the full armor of God so that you can take your stand against the devil’s schemes.

291.title: Psalm 3:3
291.subtitle: My Glory, My Shield
291.description: You, Lord, are a shield around me, my glory and the one who lifts my head high.

292.title: Luke 10:19
292.subtitle: Authority Given
292.description: I have given you authority to trample on snakes and scorpions and overcome all power of the enemy.

293.title: Isaiah 59:19
293.subtitle: Enemy Fleeing
293.description: When the enemy comes in like a flood, the Spirit of the Lord will lift up a standard against him.

294.title: Romans 8:37
294.subtitle: More Than Conquerors
294.description: In all these things we are more than conquerors through Him who loved us.

295.title: Psalm 112:7
295.subtitle: No Fear of Bad News
295.description: They will have no fear of bad news; their hearts are steadfast, trusting in the Lord.

296.title: Colossians 1:11
296.subtitle: Strength with Joy
296.description: May you be strengthened with all power according to His glorious might so you may have endurance and joy.

297.title: Isaiah 35:4
297.subtitle: Be Strong, Fear Not
297.description: Say to those with anxious hearts, 'Be strong, do not fear! Your God will come with a saving justice.'

298.title: Psalm 118:6
298.subtitle: Secure Confidence
298.description: The Lord is with me; I will not be afraid—what can mere mortals do to me?

299.title: John 14:1
299.subtitle: Let Not Your Heart Be Troubled
299.description: Do not let your hearts be troubled. Trust in God; trust also in Me.

300.title: Isaiah 12:2
300.subtitle: No Fear, Just Strength
300.description: I will trust and not be afraid. The Lord, the Lord Himself, is my strength and defense—He has become my salvation.

301.title: 1 Peter 1:5
301.subtitle: Shielded by Power
301.description: You are shielded by God’s power until the coming of the salvation that is ready to be revealed.

302.title: Psalm 20:1
302.subtitle: Answer in Trouble
302.description: May the Lord answer you in the day of trouble; may the name of the God of Jacob protect you.

303.title: Jeremiah 29:13
303.subtitle: Seeking with All
303.description: You will seek Me and find Me when you seek Me with all your heart.

304.title: 2 Timothy 1:7
304.subtitle: Fearless Spirit
304.description: For God gave us a spirit not of fear but of power, love, and self-control—reclaiming confidence from the shadows.

305.title: Psalm 107:1
305.subtitle: Enduring Love
305.description: Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; His love endures forever.

306.title: 1 Thessalonians 5:18
306.subtitle: Give Thanks Always
306.description: Give thanks in all circumstances, for this is God’s will for you in Christ Jesus.

307.title: Colossians 3:15
307.subtitle: Peace and Thanks
307.description: Let the peace of Christ rule in your hearts—and be thankful.

308.title: Psalm 9:1
308.subtitle: Wholehearted Praise
308.description: I will give thanks to you, Lord, with all my heart; I will tell of all your wonderful deeds.

309.title: Hebrews 13:15
309.subtitle: Sacrifice of Praise
309.description: Let us continually offer a sacrifice of praise to God—the fruit of lips that confess His name.

310.title: Psalm 50:14
310.subtitle: Thankful Offering
310.description: Sacrifice thank offerings to God, fulfill your vows to the Most High.

311.title: Philippians 4:6
311.subtitle: Prayer with Thanks
311.description: Do not be anxious—but in everything, by prayer and petition with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

312.title: Psalm 95:2
312.subtitle: Joyful Thanksgiving
312.description: Let us come before Him with thanksgiving and extol Him with music and song.

313.title: Isaiah 12:4
313.subtitle: Proclaim His Name
313.description: Give praise to the Lord, proclaim His name; make known among the nations what He has done.

314.title: Psalm 30:12
314.subtitle: Never Silent
314.description: So that my heart may sing your praises and not be silent—Lord my God, I will praise you forever.

315.title: Luke 17:15-16
315.subtitle: Grateful Return
315.description: One of the lepers, seeing he was healed, returned to Jesus and threw himself at His feet in thanks.

316.title: Psalm 118:28
316.subtitle: Exalt and Thank
316.description: You are my God, and I will praise you; you are my God, and I will exalt you.

317.title: James 1:17
317.subtitle: Every Good Gift
317.description: Every good and perfect gift is from above, coming down from the Father of heavenly lights.

318.title: Psalm 145:7
318.subtitle: Joyful Memory
318.description: They celebrate your abundant goodness and joyfully sing of your righteousness.

319.title: Psalm 136:1
319.subtitle: Forever Mercy
319.description: Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good. His steadfast love endures forever.

320.title: Colossians 4:2
320.subtitle: Watchful and Thankful
320.description: Devote yourselves to prayer, being watchful and thankful.

321.title: Psalm 103:2
321.subtitle: Forget Not
321.description: Praise the Lord, my soul, and forget not all His benefits.

322.title: John 1:16
322.subtitle: Grace Upon Grace
322.description: From His fullness we have all received grace upon grace—a cascade of mercy and love.

323.title: Psalm 28:7
323.subtitle: Heart Leaps for Joy
323.description: My heart trusts in Him, and He helps me; my heart leaps for joy, and with my song I praise Him.

324.title: Romans 1:21
324.subtitle: Honor and Thanks
324.description: Though they knew God, they neither glorified Him as God nor gave thanks to Him—gratitude is honor.

325.title: Psalm 100:4
325.subtitle: Thanksgiving Gates
325.description: Enter His gates with thanksgiving and His courts with praise—give thanks and bless His name.

326.title: 2 Corinthians 9:11
326.subtitle: Overflowing Thanks
326.description: You will be enriched in every way so that you can be generous—resulting in thanksgiving to God.

327.title: Daniel 2:23
327.subtitle: Thanks and Praise
327.description: I thank and praise you, God of my ancestors—you give wisdom and reveal deep mysteries.

328.title: Psalm 138:1
328.subtitle: Praise with Whole Heart
328.description: I give thanks with my whole heart—before the gods I sing your praise.

329.title: Psalm 116:12-13
329.subtitle: Thanksgiving Offering
329.description: What shall I return to the Lord for all His goodness? I will lift the cup of salvation and call on His name.

330.title: 1 Chronicles 16:34
330.subtitle: Faithful Forever
330.description: Give thanks to the Lord, for He is good; His love endures forever—a call sung through generations.

331.title: Revelation 7:12
331.subtitle: Heaven's Thanks
331.description: Praise and glory and wisdom and thanks be to our God forever and ever. Amen.

332.title: Psalm 92:1
332.subtitle: Good to Give Thanks
332.description: It is good to give thanks to the Lord and to sing praises to Your name, Most High.

333.title: Psalm 75:1
333.subtitle: Near and Known
333.description: We give thanks to you, God; we give thanks, for your name is near and your deeds are known.

334.title: Psalm 149:1
334.subtitle: Assembly Praise
334.description: Praise the Lord! Sing to the Lord a new song, His praise in the assembly of the saints.

335.title: Isaiah 9:2
335.subtitle: Light in Darkness
335.description: The people walking in darkness have seen a great light—on those living in deep darkness a light has dawned.

336.title: John 1:9
336.subtitle: True Light
336.description: The true light that gives light to everyone was coming into the world—illumination for all people.

337.title: Isaiah 7:14
337.subtitle: Emmanuel
337.description: The virgin will conceive and give birth to a son, and will call Him Immanuel—God with us.

338.title: Matthew 1:21
338.subtitle: Save His People
338.description: She will bear a son, and you shall call His name Jesus, for He will save His people from their sins.

339.title: Luke 1:30-31
339.subtitle: Do Not Fear
339.description: The angel said, 'Do not be afraid, Mary; you have found favor with God. You will conceive a son.'

340.title: Luke 2:10-11
340.subtitle: Good News
340.description: The angel declared, 'I bring you good news of great joy—for today a Savior has been born to you.'

341.title: Micah 5:2
341.subtitle: Born in Bethlehem
341.description: Out of Bethlehem will come a ruler for Israel—one whose origins are from ancient times.

342.title: Luke 2:13-14
342.subtitle: Heavenly Praise
342.description: Suddenly a multitude of angels appeared, praising God: 'Glory to God in the highest!'

343.title: Isaiah 60:1
343.subtitle: Arise, Shine
343.description: Arise, shine, for your light has come, and the glory of the Lord rises upon you.

344.title: John 1:14
344.subtitle: Word Made Flesh
344.description: The Word became flesh and made His dwelling among us—grace and truth incarnate.

345.title: Galatians 4:4-5
345.subtitle: Born to Redeem
345.description: When the time had fully come, God sent His Son to redeem those under the law.

346.title: Matthew 2:10-11
346.subtitle: Worship the King
346.description: The Magi rejoiced with great joy, bowed down, and worshiped the Christ—bringing gifts of gold, frankincense, and myrrh.

347.title: Isaiah 11:1
347.subtitle: Branch from Jesse
347.description: A shoot will come up from the stump of Jesse; from his roots a Branch will bear fruit.

348.title: Luke 2:19
348.subtitle: Treasured Truths
348.description: Mary treasured up all these things and pondered them in her heart—sacred memory in quiet faith.

349.title: Psalm 98:4
349.subtitle: Joy to the World
349.description: Make a joyful noise to the Lord, all the earth; break forth in joyous song and sing praises!

350.title: Titus 3:4-5
350.subtitle: Kindness Appears
350.description: When the kindness and love of God our Savior appeared, He saved us—not by works, but by mercy.

351.title: Isaiah 52:7
351.subtitle: Beautiful News
351.description: How beautiful on the mountains are the feet of those who bring good news and proclaim salvation.

352.title: John 3:17
352.subtitle: Not to Condemn
352.description: God did not send His Son into the world to condemn the world, but to save it through Him.

353.title: Zechariah 9:10
353.subtitle: Peace to Nations
353.description: He will proclaim peace to the nations. His rule will extend from sea to sea, to the ends of the earth.

354.title: Philippians 2:7
354.subtitle: Servant Born
354.description: Jesus emptied Himself and took the form of a servant, being born in human likeness.

355.title: 2 Corinthians 9:15
355.subtitle: Indescribable Gift
355.description: Thanks be to God for His indescribable gift—Christ, the treasure beyond all measure.

356.title: Hebrews 1:3
356.subtitle: Radiance of Glory
356.description: The Son is the radiance of God’s glory and the exact representation of His nature.

357.title: Revelation 22:17
357.subtitle: Come and Drink
357.description: The Spirit and the bride say, 'Come!' Let the one who is thirsty come and drink freely.

358.title: Romans 15:13
358.subtitle: Overflowing Hope
358.description: May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace as you trust Him, so that you overflow with hope.

359.title: Isaiah 9:6
359.subtitle: Unto Us a Child
359.description: For to us a child is born, to us a son is given; the government will rest on His shoulders—Prince of Peace.

360.title: Matthew 2:2
360.subtitle: Where Is the King?
360.description: The Magi asked, 'Where is the one who has been born king of the Jews? We saw His star and have come to worship Him.'

361.title: Revelation 21:5
361.subtitle: All Things New
361.description: He who sits on the throne said, 'Behold, I am making all things new!'

362.title: Jeremiah 29:11
362.subtitle: Plans for You
362.description: I know the plans I have for you, declares the Lord—plans to prosper you and give you a future.

363.title: Psalm 65:11
363.subtitle: Crowned with Goodness
363.description: You crown the year with your bounty, and your paths overflow with abundance.

364.title: Proverbs 16:9
364.subtitle: Guided Steps
364.description: In their hearts humans plan their course, but the Lord establishes their steps.

365.title: Isaiah 43:18-19
365.subtitle: New Year, New Way
365.description: Forget the former things; do not dwell on the past. See, I am doing a new thing!

366.title: Revelation 22:21
366.subtitle: Final Amen
366.description: The grace of the Lord Jesus be with God’s people. Amen.
